headline: Hormel’s Peanutter Search Shows Brand Effort As Shares Screen Undervalued
summary: PLANTERS, a Hormel Foods brand, has opened applications for its annual "Peanutters" program. Selected recruits will drive the NUTmobile and act as brand ambassadors in an immersive, travel focused role. The initiative targets recent graduates and early career talent interested in marketing and consumer engagement. For Hormel Foods (NYSE:HRL), the PLANTERS NUTmobile program illustrates how an established food company can keep its brands visible and relevant with younger consumers. Packaged...
